name: Death Touch
description: Your opponent dies if they are hit with 13 more attack cards.

immediateEffect.script: Log(PlayerDisplayName + " marks " + OpponentDisplayName + " with the Death Touch!");

hooks.OnTakeDamage: if (Card != null && Card.Type == CardType_Attack) { if (!State.ContainsKey("hits")) State["hits"] = 0; State["hits"] = (int)State["hits"] + 1; int remaining = 13 - (int)State["hits"]; Log("Death Touch: " + remaining + " hits remaining!"); if ((int)State["hits"] >= 13) { Player.CurrentHP = 0; Log("Death Touch activates! " + PlayerDisplayName + " dies!"); } }
